scripts.clean: rm -f package-lock.json && rm -f packages/api/package-lock.json && rm -f packages/outline/package-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/api/node_modules && rm -rf packages/outline/node_modules
scripts.init:drupal:windows: cp -R scripts/drupal packages/drupal && cd packages/drupal && composer install && lando poweroff && lando start && lando site-setup
scripts.init:drupal:mac: cp -R scripts/drupal packages/drupal && cd packages/drupal && /usr/local/bin/composer.phar install && lando poweroff && lando start && lando site-setup
